attributes.action: Introduce a 'Covid Windfall Tax' on businesses profiting from the pandemic .
attributes.additional_details: Government (i.e  the taxpayer) has supported businesses adversely affected by Covid. It is only fair that all those that have profited from the pandemic should give something back.
attributes.background: Some businesses (e.g. supermarkets, amazon) are making vastly increased profits because of the pandemic. A percentage of this increased profit should go to the NHS - helping to keep more of those companies' customers alive.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you may like to sign:

Implement a Covid Windfall tax on companies which profited from the Covid Crisis
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596649
